official-title.#text:
To revise the boundaries of John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Sachuest Point Unit
			 RI–04P, Easton Beach Unit RI–05P, Almy Pond Unit RI–06, and Hazards Beach
			 Unit RI–07 in Rhode Island.

header.#text: Replacement of John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System map

quote.#tail: , included in the set of maps entitled
quote.#text:
Sachuest Point Unit RI–04P, Easton Beach Unit RI–05P, Almy Pond Unit RI–06, Hazards Beach Unit
			 RI–07
John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System

John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Sachuest Point Unit RI–04P, Easton Beach Unit
			 RI–05P, Almy Pond Unit RI–06, and Hazards Beach Unit RI–07

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
and relating
			 to certain John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System units in Rhode
			 Island, is hereby replaced by another map relating to the units entitled

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 4(a) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall keep the replacement map referred to in subsection (a) on file
			 and available for inspection in accordance with the provisions of

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section
			 4(b) of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act
